archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Perform Final Service Test
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process initiates any final testing to confirm clearance of the Service Problem. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory This process initiates any final testing to confirm clearance of the Service Problem.
